description: Demo of RentWise Assistant creating bulk rent reminders for tenants with balances over $500.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You have access to tools for fetching lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, sending rent reminders, scheduling repairs, updating payment status, and generating financial reports. Use them to fulfill user requests efficiently and accurately.
Please send rent reminders to all tenants who owe more than $500.
Sure, I’ll first retrieve the latest payment history for each of your properties so I can identify the tenants with balances over $500.

I have identified two tenants with outstanding balances greater than $500:
- Alice (alice@example.com) owes $620, due 2023‑10‑01.
- Bob (bob@example.com) owes $750, due 2023‑09‑28.
I will now send them rent reminder emails.
Reminder email sent to alice@example.com for $620 due on 2023-10-01.
Reminder email sent to bob@example.com for $750 due on 2023-09-28.
All rent reminders have been sent successfully. Let me know if you need anything else, such as a summary report or to schedule a follow‑up call.
